name: Churro Popcorn
preparation: Place kernels in Rectangular Steamer. Cover and microwave on high for 2â€“3 min, or until popped.
Meanwhile, melt butter with seasoning in small pan over medium heat until seasoning dissolves but does not burn.
Pour butter and seasoning mixture on top of popped popcorn and stir with spatula to coat.
tips: Sprinkle butter and seasoning mixture with a pinch of salt for a salted, cinnamon-cocoa caramel twist to your popcorn.
